Html:
Hi,

I would like to create a word document, in landescape layout, but with a number of columns : like a big table with two colums :)

 

But I don't find the solution to put a lot of object in a cell of table, and I don't find too the possibility to put my page in 2 columns.

 

Is it possible ?

 

Thanks,

Anna.

Sorry for the late reply. Do you mean you want to use a multicolumn layout? If so, you have to use the new colsNum attribute of paragraph style from PHPWord version 0.8 available in GitHub. Later on, you can submit your issues to GitHub since the development is continued there. Thanks.
